price: Na walisema: Hakuna mengine ila maisha yetu haya ya duniani, wala sisi hatutafufuliwa.
arabic: وَقَالُوٓاْ إِنۡ هِيَ إِلَّا حَيَاتُنَا ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمَبۡعُوثِينَ
footnotes: Na lau wakirejeshwa duniani watairudia ile ile sera yao ya mwanzo, na watasema: Hatuna sisi uhai mwingine ila huu huu uhai wa kidunia. Wala sisi hatutafufuliwa baadae.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: waqālū in hiya illā ḥayātunā al-dun'yā wamā naḥnu bimabʿūthīna
